org.locationtech.geowave.core.cli.utils

Class PropertiesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.cli.utils.PropertiesUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class PropertiesUtils
extends Object
implements Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PropertiesUtils.Getter
      Interface for providing properties to the configuration object Allows for objects other than Maps and Properties to be used as a source for settings

    • Constructor Summary
